content: this mandala is free on ravelry love crafts makerist creative fabrica and ribblr **30% discount on all paid patterns** at ravelry and ribblr through the end of the day on **june 7 2024** this is a great opportunity to grab some popular patterns at a discounted price facebook group in the third loop 1 will host a cal crochet-along june 1 2024 featuring the zeyda mandala this private facebook community is a drop-in-when-you-can group of welcoming crocheters that spans all skill levels from beginners to experts be sure to head over to facebook and join their group to get more details * round-by-round pictures that show stitch placement and clarify instructions * navigate between written instructions stitch definitions videos and pictures by clicking on the corresponding links * beginning intermediate skill level * stitches used ***slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet fpdc shallow bpdc 3dc-cluster fptr2tog fptr and picot *** thanks to my amazing testers msh0530 /people/msh0530 tayu purnamasari /designers/tayu-purnamasari snflwr1119 /people/snflwr1119 stitcheerios /people/stitcheerios wisdom61 /people/wisdom61 jovetted /people/jovetted tammy and cynthia **join my facebook group at** ~ a yarn of serendipity crochet group 2 **links to all my patterns** are also found on pinterest 3 love crafts 4 creative fabrica 6 and ribblr 7 **for more information visit ** ayarnofserendipity com 8 1 https //www facebook com/groups/inthethirdloop 2 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity 3 https //www pinterest com/grampammy531814/ 4 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/user/maker/fd8c06ed-a61c-4880-9adf-7b597be6fc5a 6 https //www creativefabrica com/designer/ayarnofserendipity/ 7 https //ribblr com/shop/a-yarn-of-serendipity 8 https //ayarnofserendipity com/
